info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pike, east central Polk and southwestern Montgomery Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Albert Pike Recreation Area, or 12 miles northeast of Umpire, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Little Missouri Falls Recreatio... Roaring Branch Natural Area... Langley... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
